title: Calories in Chicken Wings
meta_description: Discover calories in wings, including full nutrition breakdown for a serving of 6 roasted chicken wings with skin, plus macros, tweaks, and FAQs.
assumptions: Bone-in chicken wings with skin, roasted; each wing ~45g (meat and skin); no added sauce or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, brand, and additions like sauce; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Six roasted chicken wings with skin provide ~594 kcal and ~49 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Buffalo style (add hot sauce and butter per wing)

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one roasted wing with skin.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 wings provide ~49 g protein, great for muscle building.
Plain roasted wings have 0 g carbs; breaded or sauced versions add some.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in wings?
faqs.a: Frying adds ~30 kcal per wing due to absorbed oil.

faqs.q: What about sodium in chicken wings?
faqs.a: Low in plain wings (~33 mg per wing), but sauces can increase it significantly.
